title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 3057/94 of 14 December 1994 concerning the classification of certain goods in Taric
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3057/94 of 14 December 1994 concerning the classification of certain goods in Taric
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The goods described in column 1 of the annexed table are now classified within the appropriate Taric code indicated in column 2 of the said table.

Binding tariff information issued by the customs authorities of Member States which do not conform to the rules established by this Regulation can continue to be invoked under the provisions of Article 12 (6) of Regulation (EEC) No 2913/92  for a period of three months.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 December 1994.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 182, 16. 7. 1994, p. 9.
(3) OJ No L 302, 19. 10. 1992, p. 1.
ANNEX
"" ID="1">Frozen blackcurrants, without the addition of sugar or other sweeteners, with loose stalks for about 20 % of the berries present.> ID="2">0811 20 39 * 90> ID="3">Classification is determined by the provisions of general rules 1 and 6  for the interpretation of the Combined Nomenclature and by the wording of Taric code 0811 20 39 * 90.">
